description: A temporary tattoo on Luffy's arm showing '3D' crossed out with '2Y' underneath. This served as a coded message to the Straw Hat crew about their reunion plans.
significance: The tattoo is a crucial communication tool that informs the scattered Straw Hats to meet in two years instead of three days. It demonstrates Luffy's strategic thinking and trust in his crew's ability to understand his message.

keyMoments.description: Zoro explains the meaning of the 3D2Y tattoo to Perona - the Straw Hats will reunite in two years (2Y) instead of the original plan of three days (3D).

notes: The tattoo eventually fades away after serving its purpose as a secret code to the crew.
